title: Elon Musk: Tech Visionary Turns Social Media King - NDTV
content: Elon Musk: Tech Visionary Turns Social Media King  NDTV
description: Sometimes it feels like it's Elon Musk's world and we just live in it. The endlessly innovative, endlessly eccentric billionaire has struck a deal to buy Twitter -- giving him control of the social media network on which the world debates, mobilizes
